0000:
thread 'KEYS'
int key_var
$2072 = -1995422835
$2073 = 1342335705
$2074 = -1025694744
$2075 = 1949868543
$2076 = 495648893

$2090 = 568872961

$2092 = -1731952192
$2093 = 1560281088
$2094 = -1034199457
$2095 = 4
03FD: set_player -5035 handling_responsiveness 8532704
0124: write_memory_address 6850752 value 8532745

while true
    wait 0
    0125: key_var = read_memory_address 10553666
    0AB3: var KEY = key_var
    0124: write_memory_address 10553666 value 0
    //01E5: text_1number_highpriority 'SPEED' $KEY 10 ms 1  // ~1~.
end
